BR_text.BRsummary: SFrame.show has a giant weird tooltip
BR_text.BRdescription:
Repro steps:
 import turicreate as tc
 sf = tc.SFrame.read_csv('https://docs-assets.developer.apple.com/turicreate/datasets/tc-clang-format-results.csv')
 sf.show()
 Expected: no giant weird tooltip
 Actual: See screenshot
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5673251/38529519-09a9da0a-3c1a-11e8-821f-bd9b5fe7e5d5.png></denchmark-link>
